reviewText: I originally checked this out from our local library when looking for video instruction in beginning guitar for my 10 year old. I studied guitar in my youth and still play. The presenter is likable and has a very nice style that is conversational and still detailed. The structure of the program is good and one can pick and choose different subjects. The best recommendation I can make is that we checked it out for free and purchased it to have it at home.

I was thanked for it and I know nothing else.

I assume it was all that was indicated by others who had received it.
